title: 1.7.10 HMCL启动器 有Forge 崩溃，无法进入
author: 沱沱河TTH
txt_content:
Mac 版 HMCL，1.7.10版本添加在线安装Forge，之前还好好的，现在就一进游戏就崩，别的版本大多数没有问题，崩溃界面如图，错误代码如下（白的应该是没问题的吧，我就不复制过来了）
[23:38:35] [main/FATAL] [FML]: There appear to be jars extracted into the mods directory. This is VERY BAD and will almost NEVER WORK WELL
[23:38:35] [main/FATAL] [FML]: You should place original jars only in the mods directory. NEVER extract them to the mods directory.
[23:38:35] [main/FATAL] [FML]: The directories below appear to be extracted jar files. Fix this before you continue.
[23:38:35] [main/FATAL] [FML]: Directory TrainCraft-4.3.0_001 contains [MANIFEST.MF][23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]: java.lang.RuntimeException: Extracted mod jars found, loading will NOT continue
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.discoverCoreMods(CoreModManager.java:273)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager.handleLaunch(CoreModManager.java:221)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupHome(FMLLaunchHandler.java:90)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.setupClient(FMLLaunchHandler.java:67)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLLaunchHandler.configureForClientLaunch(FMLLaunchHandler.java:34)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker.injectIntoClassLoader(FMLTweaker.java:126)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:115)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
[23:38:35] [main/ERROR] [FML]: An error occurred trying to configure the minecraft home at /Users/TU/Library/Application Support/minecraft for Forge Mod Loader[23:38:35] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]: cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager$ExitTrappedException
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.FMLSecurityManager.checkPermission(FMLSecurityManager.java:25)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkExit(SecurityManager.java:761)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at java.lang.Runtime.exit(Runtime.java:107)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at java.lang.System.exit(System.java:971)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:138)
[23:38:35] [main/INFO] [STDERR]: [java.lang.Throwable$WrappedPrintStream:println:748]:         at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
Exception in thread "main"

replies.author: chixvv
replies.txt_content: 只能将jar文件放在mods文件夹中，不能将其解压缩后放到到mods目录下。mod文件夹下不应存在TrainCraft-4.3.0_001文件夹

replies.author: 沱沱河TTH
replies.txt_content: 看了翻译，好像懂了一些……我先去试试

replies.author: 沱沱河TTH
replies.txt_content: 已解决了……感谢……虽然没人回答，但我为什么手贱把一个文件夹放到了mods文件夹里面？？？我在想什么？？？

replies.author: 沱沱河TTH
replies.txt_content:
chixvv 发表于 2020-4-20 23:45
只能将jar文件放在mods文件夹中，不能将其解压缩后放到到mods目录下。mod文件夹下不应存在TrainCraft-4.3.0 ...
谢谢啦！我刚刚看到浏览器自动的翻译茅塞顿开了，不过还是感谢你的回答了！
